description: With this adapter you can convert IDE to SATA and SATA to IDE: it's bidirectional! It can be plugged into your drives or your motherboard. Can be used to upgrade an older computer, optical drive, or hard drive. Or, use it to make a newer drive backward-compatible! Package includes 12"/30cm SATA cable, power adapter cable, and adapter bridge.Features:Converts sevial ATA to paraller ATA.Converts Parallel ATA to Serial ATA.Supports ATA 100/133.Compliant with Serial ATA specification.One 40pin IDE port.One serial ATA port.One 2 pin power connector.Specifications:IDE to SATA / SATA to IDE drive interface adapter - use with motherboards or drives1 x 40 pin port (IDE/PATA)1 x SATA port1 x 2 pin power connectorSupports ATA 100/133
title: IDE to SATA or SATA to IDE Adapter
